DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare angle hip joint releasing quadratus lumborum muscle .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Releasing Quadratus Lumborum Muscle Hip Joint ROM Asymptomatic Individuals
DOC.detailed_description: The 1st physical therapist perform modified Thomas test position . The participant ask lie supine edge couch . The participant hold one knee chest tightly knee bent end couch . The 2nd physical therapist measure angle hip knee use standard goniometer baseline . The quadratus lumborum muscle release . Then measurement repeat .
DOC.criteria: 1. asymptomatic male female volunteer 2. age 1865 year 1. musculoskeletal symptom ( e.g . fibromyalgia , pain region , instability low extremity cause ligamentous injury , injury trauma low extremity ) , endocrine disease , RA 2. take muscle relaxant pain killer within 1 day prior data collection 3. past history low back hip surgery 4. pregnancy 5. menstruation data collection day 6. joint deformity ( e.g . knock knee , bow leg )
DOC.keyword: release muscle , quadratus lumborum , hip angle
